description: This is a Summary of Findings pertaining to the PWGSC SIGMA project based on RFI feedback from Industry

full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement SIGMA

### Reference Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4151696836 - Doc4351020618
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-12 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-22
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

### Project Description

This tender announcement is a summary of findings on the Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) SIGMA project. The summary was prepared based on feedback received from industry stakeholders through a Request for Information (RFI).

### Tender Information

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Tender Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Various trade agreements are applicable, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Country**: Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Hicham Laassouli
* **Email**: hicham.laassouli@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18259863?extsite=MTgyNTk4NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18259863?extsite=MTgyNTk4NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Details

This tender announcement is now closed and the tender status is expired. Tenderers are advised to check the notice URL for further information on the SIGMA project.
